DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety efficacy lucinactant inhalation administer aerosolize dose two dos preterm neonates 26 - 32 week gestational age receive nasal continuous positive airway pressure ( nCPAP ) Resipiratory Distress Syndrome ( RDS ) compare neonate receive nCPAP alone .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Assess Safety Efficacy Lucinactant Inhalation Premature Neonates 26 32 Weeks Gestational Age
